data.title: ஜீவா பொது தகவல் & அறிவு களஞ்சியம் - Jeeva General Information & Knowledge Repository
data.meta_description: Hello world friends, this is ‘Jeeva General Information & Knowledge Repository’ about general information and knowledge from various fields. If you have the information here you need, read on, know it and get useful. “Knowledge is strength, power and energy. Progress through these in life.”
data.text:
